A little boy was visiting his grandparents on their farm. He was given a slingshot   to 
31 play with  in the woods. He practiced and practiced but could never   _   the target. Becoming a little   _  , he headed back for dinner.
As he was returning, he saw Grandma's   _   duck. Without thinking, he shot his slingshot, hit the duck right   _   the head and killed it. He was shocked and sad. Quickly, he   _   the dead duck in the wood pile, only to see his   _   watching. Sally had seen it all, but she said nothing.
After   _   that day, Grandma said, "Sally, you wash the dishes." But Sally said, "Grandma, Johnny told me that he wanted to 39 _  in the kitchen today, didn't you, Johnny?" And then she whispered   to him, "Remember, the duck?" Then Johnny   _   the dishes.

Johnny told me he wanted to   _  ." And she whispered again, "Remember, the   _  ?" So Sally went fishing and Johnny   _   at home. www.ks5u.com
After several days, Johnny finally couldn't   _   it any longer. He went to Grandma and   _   that he had killed her pet duck and asked for her   _  . 
Hearing this, Grandma came close to the boy, gave him a hug, and said, "Sweetheart, I know. You see, I was standing at the   _   and saw the whole thing from the house. And because I   _   you, I forgive you, but I was just wondering how long you would let Sally make you her slave."
